attributes.action: to step down and call an election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
withall the mistakes that this goverment has made since it has been in power , its war on iraq  the cost of fuel, the way it dictates to the people of this country on how hey should live, the  hidden taxes we are all paying , the shocking state of our national health ,the police force 
and armed services  
also with the latest fiasco with the inland revenue

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
